The recurrence is: ways(n) = ways(n-1) + ways(n-2)

explanation: This is a classic DP problem. To reach step n, you either came from step n-1 (took 1 step) or step n-2 (took 2 steps). So ways(n) = ways(n-1) + ways(n-2). This is the Fibonacci sequence! Base cases: ways(1) = 1, ways(2) = 2. Use space optimization to only keep the last two values. Time: O(n), Space: O(1).
